1.content: You are walking to the nearest settlement, when a strange radiation storm hits, shrinking you to...
1.title: Shrunk

choices: Yes (she spends the day having fun with you)
No (she goes about her day oblivious to your existence)
11111.content: You crawl under the crack in the door at the Red Rocket you converted into a home. You walk past a sleeping Dogmeat on your way to the garage, which was now the bedroom. You look up at the bed to see Curie, your beautiful synth wife, sound asleep on top of the covers. You climb the sheets up to the bed, at which point you remembered: Curie slept in the nude. You stand in awe of the landscape that is your wife's sleeping body, her beautiful face, her mountainous breasts, her voluptuous thighs, her perfect pussy, and her dainty little feet. She wouldn't even let you near her feet anymore after you found out she was ticklish, so you figured that was your best bet to get her attention. You walk down to the foot of the bed, thinking about how best to approach the situation. You look up, her foot looking like a 5 headed beast ready to crush you at the slightest provocation. You reach out, and gently start tickling her heel, as you couldn't reach any higher. Curie twitches in her sleep, throwing you 10 feet back from your perspective. You get up, steel your nerve and start tickling again, much more aggressively this time. She starts to twitch again, and right before she kicks you, you jump out of the way, only to keep tickling once her foot receded. After repeating this a few times, Curie woke with a start, laughing uncontrollably. She looks down to see what was tickling her, and picks you up between 2 fingers. As she brings you closer to her face, she recognizes you. "Mon Dieu! Vat happened to you? Are you ok?" After explaining what happened to the best of your abilities, Curie picks you up, brings you to her lips, and gives you the biggest, longest, wettest kiss you've ever gotten. "Don't worry, my love, I vill keep you safe. Goodnight darling. " With that she tucked you in between her breasts, rolled under the covers, and went back to sleep. Does she remember this in the morning?
11111.title: Curie

After, you and she have been venturing for a while now.

111211.content: Even at your tiny size, you manage to climb down the stairs to the center of town, then scale the ramp up to Craterside Supply. By the time you finally reach the front door safely, it's already dark. You'd guess it's around 10 pm, as you watched the mercenary that guarded the store go home earlier. You squeeze under the crack in the door, and run over to Moira, who is standing barefoot at her workbench building who knows what. You try shouting her name to get her attention, but she can't hear you over the sound of her tools. You decide to get her attention by...
111211.title: Moira Brown

1112111.content: You go to her heel, which smells horrible, and bite the soft flesh as hard as you can. "Ow! That hurt! What was that", she said. She looked down and saw your tiny form on the ground. "Great, it's a baby radroach, I'll have to fumigate this place again!" After saying this, she lifts her foot, and knowing what's about to happen next, you run. Do you make it?
1112111.title: Biting her foot

1112112.content: You walk over to the front of her foot, and stand in front of her big toe. You look up, and from your perspective it seems like she stands miles high. Her breasts are so big you can't even see her face, while she just stands there oblivious to your existence. Your thoughts about the view however, are wiped from your mind as you notice the smell. You look down and see gray gunk in between her toes, which are dripping with sweat. You try gently punching her foot, but she doesn't seem to notice. You try a little harder, and still nothing. You gather up all your strength, wind your arm back, and sucker punched her toe as hard as you could. She seemed to notice, at least that's what you thought as she twitched her foot as a reflex action, shoving your face into the space between her toes, and the rest of your body under her foot. There's so much toejam and sweat that you can't breathe, and your arms are pinned, so the only thing you can do is eat until you can breathe. You take mouthful after mouthful of the foul tasting gunk, sweat gushing out of the toejam with every bite, just to get a breath of fresh air. Once you've finally eaten your way out, almost getting waterboarded from the sweat, you notice 2 things. 1: The air around you is so rancid you almost don't want to breathe, and 2: the pressure from Moira's foot crushing your body was preventing you from taking even small breaths, so you beat on her toes as hard as you can, as fast as you can. Does she notice?
1112112.title: Punching her foot

choices: No (she's angry and does tests anyway, but does cruel tests)
11121121.content: As you feel yourself getting increasingly lightheaded, you start to black out, but not before Moira notices your struggling. She lifts her foot and looks down. "Why that is the strangest little bug! I wonder what kind it is?" You're trying to catch your breath when Moira bends down and picks you up between 2 fingers. She pulls out a magnifying glass to see better, when she notices it's you, the lone wanderer. "Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry! Are you ok? What happened to you?" You're unable to answer as you're still out of breath, and she's squeezing you quite hard. "Moira, too tight!", you barely squeak out. "Oh! Sorry!" she says as she puts you down on the counter. Over the next hour, you tell her what happened, leaving out the part about eating toejam, because for some weird reason, you kinda liked it. After explaining your situation, she sat quietly for a moment, before jumping up excitedly shouting about an idea. "This is a unique opportunity, this is a chance to study the human body while shrunken! We can test out different stimuli and see how they effect you. It'll be just like the Wasteland Survival Guide!" You sit stunned for a second, before deciding...
11121121.title: Yes

choices: She remembers to take you out in a week
She forgets about you and finds you by surprise 3 weeks later
111211211.content: "Ok Moira, I'm in. Do you think you could figure out how to cure me?" "It'll take some tests, but I think I can help. This first test will be to see how your body reacts to heat, pressure, and humidity. Where better to test that than inside my jumpsuit!" You wonder if she's suggesting what you think she is. "It's summer, plus my body heat will cover the heat test, and since it's hot, I'll be sweating a lot, so that covers humidity, and for the pressure test, I'll keep you inside my cleavage so you're squeezed in between my megaton tits! Doesn't that sound like fun?" You sit in silence, in awe of the proposition in front of you. Without a second thought, you agree to the tests. She unzips her RobCo jumpsuit, then slowly pulls up the dirty white tshirt underneath, revealing her mountainous assets, whose bouncing has you mesmerized. She gently picks you up and places you in between her breasts, pushing you down until you're buried up to your shoulders. She puts her shirt back on, then zips her jumpsuit back up. As the zipper gets higher, you start getting squeezed even tighter as her boobs get squished together. Once she has the jumpsuit zipped up all the way, she looks down at you and says "Ok, I'll take you out in a week to measure the results", before taking her finger and shoving you in as deep between her massive mammaries as she could reach, then jumped up and down a few times to really get you settled in before going back to her experiment.

1112112112.content: Due to a combination of Moira's general ditzyness, having a lot on her mind, and inhaling large amounts of chemical fumes, Moira forgot she put you in her cleavage. This is not from lack of trying to get her attention on your part, you spent the better part of the past 3 weeks trying to wiggle your way out, or at the very least, remind her that you were there. Her boobs were so large, and her jumpsuit so tight, that any movements you make are unnoticeable. It was only by sheer luck that she dropped a cap down her shirt when she opened a nuka cola, and saw you when she moved her massive mammaries out of the way to get it. "Oh my gosh! I can't believe you've been there this whole time! I'm so sorry!" She quickly pulls you out with 2 fingers before placing you down on the counter to make sure you were ok. After a few hours of questions, medical tests, and way too many apologies from Moira, she realised you were completely unharmed from the experience, and that you even enjoyed it a bit. To make it up to you, she let you sleep on top of her bosom while she slept that night, and even gave you a large smooch the next morning, which left your whole head a slimy mess, and your hair a mole rats nest. "Are you ready for the next test? I've been developing a chemical to make things acid resistant, maybe I could coat you in it and lower you into my stomach on a string to test it! Or would you rather just take a break and have some fun?"
1112112112.title: She forgets about you and finds you by surprise...

11121121121.content: "The acid test sounds like a good idea" you say. Moira grabs a jar full of a strange blue chemical, then gently drops you in and allows you to swim around for a moment so you get completely covered. She picks you up and ties a string around your waist as a safety measure before raising you above her mouth. As you dangle there, she asks you if you're sure you want to do this, and after confirming that you're ok with it, lowers you into her waiting mouth. She rolls you around on her tongue and swishes you between her cheeks before allowing you to slide down her tongue into the dark abyss that is her throat. The acid proofing doesn't work as well as Moira had hoped, but it kept you from being dissolved almost instantly, and the pain was bearable. You shout your observations out to Moira, who is listening with a stethoscope pressed against her belly. While you're preoccupied, you fail to notice the string getting dissolved by some of her stomach acids that got splashed up on impact until it's too late and you feel the line go completely limp. "Uh oh", you say in a concerned tone. Moira hears you say that, and thinking something has gone wrong, pulls the string up and out, believing you're still tied to the end. She realized her mistake as she pulled the string out of her mouth and saw you weren't on it. She began to freak out before you started pounding on the walls of her stomach to get her attention, then told her you were fine once she got the stethoscope out again. After a few moments of you calming her down, she said she needed to think about the best way to deal with the situation. After a few minutes of deliberation, she told you there were 2 ways to get you out. Either she could make herself sick and vomit you out, or she could leave you in there and wait for you to pass. She asked which you would prefer, to which you answered...

111211211211.content: Despite your many objections, Moira decided you needed to come out NOW. She wondered how she would make herself sick. First she tried sticking her finger to the back of her throat. She started gagging, but pushed her finger even further back. This caused her to start dry heaving even worse, her whole digestive tract spasming trying to get the feeling to stop. You realize what Moira was planning as the rest of the bottle spilled forth from above, nearly drowning you in the intoxicating substance. I can't *hic* believe your line snapped! I'm so glad you're ok now!" Moira gives you a big hug, drunkenly smothering you in her massive cleavage. "Now that you're ok, would you wanna give me a massage, or if you want, we can have some fun", Moira said with a sultry tone.

111211212.content: "No! Are you kidding me? You almost killed me with your stupid Survival Guide! Just fix me!" She looks at you, hurt that you insulted her and her work. "Well if that's how you wanna be, then I guess it doesn't matter if you want to do this or not, you're too small to stop me!" With that, she reached down, picked you up, then dropped your tiny body into an empty nuka cola bottle. "Now, what test should I do first? How about I stick you inside my sock to test the effects of heat, humidity and pressure? Ooh! I know! I've been testing a chemical to make things acid resistant, I could coat you in it and see how you stand up against my stomach acid. Or maybe I could just have some fun with you?"
111211212.title: No (she's angry and does tests anyway, but ...

1112112122.content: Moira grabs a jar full of a strange blue chemical and pours it into the nuka cola bottle you're in. She shakes the bottle up, coating your entire body. She dumps out the excess liquid and allows you to dry. She then dumps you out into her hand, before picking you up with 2 fingers. "That liquid should make you acid proof, but remember, it's untested, so don't get your hopes up." She dangles you above her open mouth, her throat a dark cavern that seems to go on forever. You flail around trying to escape, which makes Moira laugh in your face before dropping you in. She rolls you around with her tongue for a while, swishing you between her cheeks, gently squeezing you between her teeth, and savoring your taste before finally tilting her head back and allowing you to slide down her warm, slimy tongue. Her throat muscles press on you from all sides, pulling you closer and closer to her gullet. You reach the sphincter at the end of her throat and are squeezed through into her stomach. You hear a rushing sound before being doused with nuka cola from above. Her whole stomach starts to quiver before shaking like an earthquake as an eardrum rupturing burp rushes out before being followed by laughter and a quiet "Excuse me!" A few moments later, a large mass of chewed Blamco mac and cheese knocks you down, quickly being followed by more chewed food and floods of nuka cola. The strange chemical she coated you with significantly weakens the acids effect on you, but doesn't entirely stop it. You can feel it slowly burning your skin, not enough to do any real damage, but enough to hurt. "At least I'm not being immediately dissolved", you think. For the next few hours, you're tossed and turned while Moira's stomach churns you around with her dinner. You feel your whole world shift as Moira lays down for bed. Her body slowly pushes you out of her stomach and into her intestines, getting snaked through them while she slept, the food around you slowly transforming into waste, the smell almost enough to make you sick, but you manage to hold it in, thinking your situation is already bad enough. You finally reach the end of the line, where everything grinds to a halt until Moira wakes up a few hours later. She heads to her bathroom, takes off her jumpsuit, and sits down on the toilet. She does her business until you finally pop out and splash into the foul water. She looks down and sees you in there, makes a devious face, and sits back down and finishes her business before pulling you out. "Looks like my formula needs some reworking. Oh well, back to the drawing board! Maybe next time it'll work better, but in the meantime, there's still experiments to be done. Perhaps the heat, humidity and pressure experiment? Or maybe..."
1112112122.title: Eaten alive

12.content:
As the radiation storm continued to roll through the settlement, a wave of dizziness overcame you and it seemed like the world began to stretch out away from you. You couldn’t remember eating anything bad or spoiled, and you never took chems.
As your surroundings continued to expand, realization of what was happening hit you like a brick. You were shrinking! How was this possible?
You continued to get smaller and smaller as you looked around helplessly. A Nuka Cola bottle that was originally laying at your feet, now towered over you like a skyscraper! You continued to diminish in size to the point that blades of grass looked like giant obelisks. Finally, the shrinking started to slow as you reached the measly height of...
12.title: Smaller

info.brief_description: You are shrunk around different women in the fallout world
info.description:
You are living in the fallout world when a strange radiation storm hits that causes you to shrink. You must survive the wasteland at your reduced size, and try to get help from some of the lovely ladies from acrossthe wastes.

NO DEATH, NO GORE, NO WATERSPORTS, EVERYTHING ELSE IS FINE.
